help.overview: This plugin stores and retrieves notes for users.
help.command:
This command leaves a note.
Usage: note [username|nick] notetext
Leaves a note for username (or their current nick) consisting of notetext

This command lists a user's notes.
Usage: listnotes
Returns a list of a user's stored notes.

This will read notes stored for a user.
Usage: readnote [notenum]
Reads the note number specified or your oldest note if no notenum is specified.
